so_54912228: head -1 file | cut -d'|' -f5

head -1 file | rev | cut -f1 -d'|' | rev

so_13361361: head -1

$ date=`cat myfile.csv | head -1 | grep -o -e "[0-9]\{4\}-[0-9]\{2\}-[0-9]\{2\}" | head -1`
$ echo $date
2012-11-01
$ mv myfile.csv myfile.$date.csv

so_18515889: tail -n1

$ echo "{print $(printf '$%d%.0s\n' \
                      $(i=0; for x in $(tail -n1 test.dat); do
                               echo $((++i)) $x
                             done |
                      sort -k2g) | paste -sd,)}" test.dat
{print $3,$1,$2} test.dat

tail -n+$L|head -n1

so_63475448: printf %s\\n "${!myItems[@]}" | sort |
while IFS= read -r key; do
   ...

printf %s\\0 "${!myItems[@]}" | sort -z |
while IFS= read -rd '' key; do
   paste <(printf %s "$key") <(printf %s "${myItems[$key]}")
done |
sed 's/^/_/' | column -ts $'\t' | sed 's/^_//'
